mapper.select: select dormitory_building_name,dormitory_building_height,dormitory_building_type from dormitory_building where `left` = #{left} and top = #{top}
mapper.update: update dormitory_building set dormitory_building_name = #{dormitoryBuildingName},dormitory_building_height = #{dormitoryBuildingHeight},dormitory_building_type = #{dormitoryBuildingType} where dormitory_building_id = #{dormitoryBuildingId}
